ygData.msgSnippet: So far, I can take every level [in tevfifty] at slaughter with my illegitimate team.  Although the Slime Machine scenario would be difficult if I did not

So far, I can take every level [in tevfifty] at slaughter with my 
illegitimate team.  Although the 'Slime Machine' scenario would be 
difficult if I did not have a mage or achmage.  I should be playing 
scenario 398 or 399 today and sending my illegitimate team through 
soon.

Actually, I put the generators there as a distraction.  Walking 
through the tevfifty gave me ideas on how to put together great
levels 
.  I plan on writing a file for scenarios, with some notes.  Any 
advice on how to put together great scenarios would be welcome.

Someone may have spent a lot of time putting together 'the Tryx 
chronicles', but the time was not spent wisely.

Hmm.  May I suggest a feature to the game?  Make it where a player
can 
look up what scenario numbers the person has been there with a given 
team.  It gets hairy trying to keep track of which scenario numbers a 
player has been through.
